shortdesc.ph: Sets the audio parameters and application scenarios.

ul.li: This method needs to be set before, and the settings will not take effect afterwards.
In the `COMMUNICATION` and `LIVE_BROADCASTING` profiles, the bitrate may be different from your settings due to network self-adaptation.
In scenes that require high sound quality (such as music teaching scenes), it is recommended to set profile to (4) and scenario to (3).

pd.p: Sets the sample rate, bitrate, encoding mode, and the number of channels:

plentry.pd: Audio application scenarios. Under different audio scenarios, the device uses different volume types. What is the difference between the in-call volume and the media volume?
